plugin.name: simple-tile
plugin._long: A plugin which provides some tiling features, inspired by Sway. The plugin is meant to contain only the basics.

option.name: tile_by_default
option._short: Tile enabled for specified window types
option._long: Enables tiling for windows matching the specified criteria.

option.name: keep_fullscreen_on_adjacent
option._long: Specifies whether to keep fullscreen state when changing the focus. If **true**, the next focused window will also get fullscreen. If **false**, leaves fullscreen.

option.name: button_move
option._long: When the specified button is held down, you can drag and drop tiled windows to reorder them and to change the tiling direction.

option.name: button_resize
option._long: When the specified button is held down, you can drag tiled windows to resize them.

option.name: key_toggle
option._long: Toggles tiling mode with the specified key.

option.name: key_focus_left
option._long: Moves focus to the window left with the specified key.

option.name: key_focus_right
option._long: Moves focus to the window right with the specified key.

option.name: key_focus_above
option._long: Moves focus to the window above with the specified key.

option.name: key_focus_below
option._long: Moves focus to the window below with the specified key.

option.name: inner_gap_size
option._long: Number of pixels to shrink of a view when it has a neighbor in a given direction.

option.name: outer_horiz_gap_size
option._long: Number of pixels to shrink of a view when it has no neighbor on the left or on the right.

option.name: outer_vert_gap_size
option._long: Number of pixels to shrink of a view when it has no neighbor above or below.
